Title: Requires the state comptroller and the attorney general to conduct an annual audit of the office of cannabis management
Summary: Requires the state comptroller, the attorney general and independent certified public accountants to conduct an annual audit of the office of cannabis management.
LawCode: Add ยง140, amd ยง10, Cannabis L; amd ยง8, St Fin L; amd ยง63, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, the state finance law and the executive law, in relation to requiring the state comptroller and the attorney general to conduct an annual audit of the office of cannabis management
